mapper.select:
select s.* /* SkillMapper.selectSkillList :: 스킬 리스트 조회 */ from skill s inner join skill_effect se on s.id = se.skill_id
se.effect_cd = #{effectCd}

select se.* /* SkillMapper.selectSkillEffectList :: 스킬 효과 리스트 조회 */ , (select c.code_name from code c where c.type = 3 and c.code = se.effect_cd) as effect_name from skill_effect se
se.skill_id = #{id}

select st.* /* SkillMapper.selectSkillTriggerList :: 스킬 발동조건 리스트 조회 */ , (select c.code_name from code c where c.type = 5 and c.code = st.trigger_type_cd) as trigger_name from skill_trigger st
st.skill_id = #{id}
